title: Ribeira da Janela (Ilhéus da)
body: Not far from the coastal area of the Ribeira da Janela parish, there are the islets of Ruama, Comprido, and Ilhéuzinho, commonly called the Ilhéus da Ribeira da Janela. One of these islets gave its name to the river and the parish, as mentioned in the previous article.
